A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Its a pretty good movie as its emotional for me especially the Yoda's scene and the last of Luke's with the Force song. But its lack of infomations that need to fill the plot holes of Snoke' past and what happen to The Knight of Rens (aka former apprentices of Luke ). Also there are so much waste of characters like DJ\, Exercutioner Stormtrooper and Phasma\, and I didnt see enough action of AT ST. But still I loved it as it brings back the feeling of ANH and TESB that make me emotional.
